This Makes Me Want To Quit Video

Published: 2009-12-16

WTF?! How? Who? What? My teacher sent me this, it's from a photography student who just took his first video class. This is from a freaking Fundamentals of Editing class. I can't believe how good this kid is. He has great things in his future. Oh, and he did the music and sang the song too. Fantastic.

Head over to his youtube page and leave a comment letting him know how awesome he is.
